channel.title: What's on? Kexin's news and agenda
channel.description: Updates on my artworks and events

item.title: I will perform at the opening of Wasteland Festival
item.description: On July 3rd at Het Niewe Institute, I will bring out the ASMR show and hysteric singing from the work "Lewd Banquet" for the opening of Wasteland.

item.title: Great pleasure to meet the alderman Saskia Bruines
item.description: On July 2nd, I had the honour to meet the alderman of The Hague Saskia Bruines and gift her my first Stadstekenaar drawing.
